content: Once you've taken out his entire health bar, he'll disappear again, sometimes summoning a lightning storm to track you as you try and race back over to him. Take it slow and focus on evasion rather than trying to close the distance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow'.
The content is as follows:
Once you've taken out his entire health bar, he'll disappear again, sometimes summoning a lightning storm to track you as you try and race back over to him. Take it slow and focus on evasion rather than trying to close the distance.
